
# Agents

This document describes the agents, bots, or automation used in this project.

## Overview
- **Copilot**: Used for code suggestions and automation.
- **CI/CD**: Add details about your CI/CD agents here (e.g., GitHub Actions).
- **Design Agent**: Ensures UI/UX consistency, reviews design implementation, and checks adherence to design system and accessibility standards.
- **Security Agent**: Scans for vulnerabilities, enforces secure coding practices, and monitors dependencies for known security issues.
- **Testing Agent**: Automates running unit, integration, and end-to-end tests, and reports coverage and failures.
- **Spec Agent**: Validates that code and features align with project specifications and requirements, and checks for up-to-date documentation.

- Document any new agents or bots added to the project here.
